name: Hue Hacker Helper
tagline: Chrome extension to quickly get your phillips hue API key for your bridge.
body:
### Hue Hacker Helper.
This extension will help you quickly get an API key from your Phillips Hue Bridge.  You can [Download Now](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/hue-hacker/pkkpnjaldaemalgekcdjimfaembcnlhe) and add to chrome to quickly get started.

### Authors and Contributors
I am currently the sole developer of Hue Hacker but if you would like to contribute or have a suggestion let me know!

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Hue Hacker? [Contact support](mailto://huehacker@gmail.com) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
